## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.value property

The currently selected value(s) in the accordion. This represents the values of the open accordion item(s).


 {<!-- -->T \| T\[\] \| null<!-- -->} The currently selected value(s) or null if no item is selected.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly value: import("@angular/core").ModelSignal<T | T[] | null>;
```
